body_html:
Quadratic because tf.concat creates a copy to fit the two new tensors and its backprop is a split which creates two tensors whose sizes add to the sizes of the inputs to the concat. At every iteration. Unfortunately I'm not currently looking at this but contributions are welcome.
…

body:
Quadratic because tf.concat creates a copy to fit the two new tensors and
its backprop is a split which creates two tensors whose sizes add to the
sizes of the inputs to the concat.  At every iteration.

Unfortunately I'm not currently looking at this but contributions are
welcome.
